* A GUI for Duke using FXML.
* This class allows a new task to be added to a TaskList object.
* Returns a command which allows us to add a task to taskList.
* Executes this command by adding this task to taskList.
* Informs user that command has been executed.
* @param taskList task list which this task should be added to
* @param storage storage which stores all tasks on the local hard disk, if any
public String execute(TaskList taskList, Optional<Storage> storage) {
* This allows commands, as indicated by a user's input, to be executed.
* @param taskList task list which this task should be added to
* @param storage storage which stores all tasks on the local hard disk, if any
* @throws Exception if command cannot be executed
public String execute(TaskList taskList, Optional<Storage> storage) throws Exception;
